oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys - Audition (15 min)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition recording for a radio show featuring Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys, including Tiny (guitar/steel guitar) and Art (accordion). Circa late 1940s. Content is similar to TR001674_1 and TR001679_1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Smokey Smith; Gold Coast Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Smokey Smith) -- Theme (Gold Coast Express) -- That's How Much I Love You (Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys) -- Smokey Smith talks -- Blues In My Mind (Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys) -- Smokey Smith talks -- Smokey Smith reads poem 'The Little Church' -- Smokey Smith talks -- I Want A Girl (Just Like The Girl That Married Dear Old Dad) (Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys) -- Smokey Smith talks -- Boogie Woogie instrumental (Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys) -- Closing statement (Smokey Smith) -- Theme (Gold Coast Express)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Smokey, 1922-; Gold Coast Boys (Musical group); KSON (Radio station : San Diego, Calif.)
